p: A multivariable analysis performed using the LASSO method is presented in S1 Table. Age (aOR 1.08 95%CI, 1.05–1.12, p<0.0001), female sex (aOR 2.44 95%CI, 1.03–5.88, p = 0.046), vomiting (aOR 3.37 95%CI, 1.06–11.8, p = 0.045), and Low blood pressure (aOR 6.67 95%CI, 1.47–36.6, p = 0.02) were identified as the mains risk factors for CCA.
